summary: In Berlin, an alcoholic man, recently released from prison, joins his elderly friend and a prostitute in a determined dream to leave Germany and seek a better life in Wisconsin.
cast: Bruno S.|Eva Mattes|Clemens Scheitz|Wilhelm von Homburg|Burkhard Driest|Clayton Szalpinski|Ely Rodriguez|Alfred Edel|Scott McKain|Ralph Wade|Michael Gahr|Vaclav Vojta|Yuecsel Topcuguerler|Bob Evans|Der Brave Beo|Al
title: Stroszek
